title: Studio APT $1325/mo
posting_body: Quaint studio apartment located in North Oakland near Berkeley.
Recently renovated with new appliances as well as new carpets and drapes.
Lots of natural sunlight streaming into the kitchen and main living area.
Wi-fi usage must be covered by tenant.
$200 refundable security deposit + 1st months rent required upon tenants move-in.
Tenant must have a credit score of 675 or above to be considered.
